entries.name: Bloodweed
entries.description:
Until cured, whenever the afflicted rolls damage, they roll an additional d4 and subtract that result from their normal damage.

Subtract from damage roll: [[/roll 1d4]]

entries.name: Goldenroot
entries.description: The target treats the next creature they see as a trusted ally, until proved otherwise.

entries.name: Oil of Tagit
entries.description: The target falls into a light sleep.

entries.name: Serpent's Tears
entries.description: Anyone dealing damage against the target rolls twice and takes the better result.
